# k8s_longhorn_io_orphan_v1beta2 (Resource)

Orphan is where Longhorn stores orphan object.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "k8s_longhorn_io_orphan_v1beta2" "minimal" {
  metadata = {
    name = "test"
  }
}
```
